publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2993.2 Roseanna Cunningham: Prison Estates Review-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2993) in the name of Mr Jim Wallace, leave out from "welcomes" to end and insert "notes the publication of the consultation paper Proposals for the Future of the Scottish Prison Service Estate; believes that to help achieve a safer Scotland the prison estate should facilitate the secure holding of prisoners and the delivery of effective rehabilitation programmes, and that prisons should provide a reasonable standard of accommodation; recognises that these objectives can only be achieved by substantial modernisation of the present prison estate; further notes that private prisons have serious deficiencies, in their management of both inmates and staff, and asserts that, in the interest of public safety, such a key component of the criminal justice system should remain in the public sector."
